subsection.name: Role Configuration
subsection.source: <role name="org.apache.fulcrum.pbe.PBEService" shorthand="PBEService" default-class="org.apache.fulcrum.pbe.PBEServiceImpl" early-init="true" component-type="merlin" description="Provides Password Based Encyrption using JCA/JCE" />

subsection.name: Component Configuration
subsection.p: The configuration parameters are basically used to make the service compatible with existing applications using password based encryption.

tr.td: Defines the JCE provider to be used. Depending on your environement you leave it empty to get an appropriate implementation automatically or use "SunJCE" or "BC"
Contains the hex-encoded salt for PBE
Defines the number of SHA-1 invocations to create the password. Changing this value creates completely different passwords.
